name: Shengli Portal
text:
Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
{u}{u}{u}{u}{u}: Reveal the top six cards of your library. Put up to two instant and/or sorcery cards from among them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.  Instant and sorcery spells you cast this turn cost {1} less to cast.
